text: - I'm Ian Beaver.

I am the chief scientist
of the Da Vinci Group
at Verint Systems.
Generative AI is impacting
the contact center industry massively.

So we are seeing all kinds
of opportunity for automation
in the contact center space,

which allows us to save our
customers a lot of money.

The biggest misconception of
Generative AI among the public

is that it's easy and that
once it's been done in ChatGPT
you can do it everywhere.

And they fail to realize
the amount of effort

to make something repetitive,
consistent, and trustworthy.
Just because you have talked to ChatGPT

doesn't make you an
expert prompt engineer.
So how we balance security, safety,

and fast delivery within
Verint is we have centralized
AI as a service.

So our products are essentially
clients of our AI models,

and that allows us to do
the safety in one place,

the compliance in one
place, and quickly iterate.

AWS can support us on
our Generative AI journey

by providing a large
selection of language models

through Bedrock and Jumpstart
that helps us quickly iterate
and evaluate all of the options.
We support 80 different languages

and the availability of
models in different regions
is also hugely important to us.

AWS helps my software company
be more scalable, flexible,
and reach all regions of the world.
(upbeat music)
